Data Retrieval: GET all collections, GET by id, GET filtered via query, GET user-specific data
Data Relations: POST create relation, DELETE delete relation
Data Modification: PUT|PATCH modify resources, DELETE delete resources
Advanced: ONE of {advanced filtering/sorting, pagination, additive params, binary upload, enhanced security, complex relations/transactions}

Advanced ✔: GET /api/v1/games with page,size,sort + additive filters date|dateFrom|dateTo|leagueId|status
